name: Voice activated spell casting (tech demo)
description:
This is not really a game and more of a tech demo. I wanted to see if it was possible to cast spells with your voice, and it totally is! 

Video demonstration: link

[IMPORTANT] - Only works on Windows machines. If using your voice doesn't work, make sure to do the following:

1. Make sure your windows speech language set to English. Do this by going into settings, search for Speech and set the spoken language.

2. Make sure only one microphone is connected to your computer at a time. If more than one mic is connected, sometimes the game picks the wrong microphone as input and then it won't work.

The above should be enough. Also remember to speak clearly, the voice recognition is a little spotty.

CREDIT: Voice activation is done through microsoft window's Unity voice API package - see https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/Windows.Speech.KeywordRecognizer.html

Some of the shader effects were made possible by the awesome tutorials from Gabriel Aguiar Prod. - see https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtb1s859RTxx-RIgFs5ZVQA

SFX: From zapslat.com & fesliyanstudios.com
